remarks: Characterization of identity in a structure product.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 10-Jan-2015.)
statement:
prdsplusgcl.y $e |- Y = ( S Xs_ R ) $.
prdsplusgcl.b $e |- B = ( Base ` Y ) $.
prdsplusgcl.p $e |- .+ = ( +g ` Y ) $.
prdsplusgcl.s $e |- ( ph -> S e. V ) $.
prdsplusgcl.i $e |- ( ph -> I e. W ) $.
prdsplusgcl.r $e |- ( ph -> R : I --> Mnd ) $.
prdsidlem.z $e |- .0. = ( 0g o. R ) $.
prdsidlem $p |- ( ph -> ( .0. e. B /\ A. x e. B ( ( .0. .+ x ) = x /\ ( x .+ .0. ) = x ) ) ) $.
$d .+ x $.
$d B x $.
$d I x $.
$d R x $.
$d S x $.
$d V x $.
$d W x $.
$d Y x $.
$d ph x $.
